name: Fahrstuhl 2023 - Elevator 2023
description:
Try to find your Business Partner in a Building with 9 Floors. You can go by Lift by pressing the Number of the Floor. But be careful ... you can also crash & lose your precious life!

Press '*' on Floor Choose Screen to end the Game.

I wish to thank K.-H. Herpel for the Original 1985 PD Game Idea ... which I improved by adding new GFX & SFX plus some little Easter Eggs too ...
